query:
SELECT c.assy_date, a.serial_num SHIM_SERIAL, b.serial_num PD_SERIAL, SubStr(b.vendor_lot_num,1,6) vendor_lot, c.part_num
FROM phase2.part_info a, phase2.part_info b , phase2.trk_assembly  c
WHERE
b.serial_num  = c.serial_num
AND  c.assy_serial_num = a.serial_num
and c.part_num =  '001051571'
and c.ASSY_DATE > sysdate -5
